amendment.description: Amendment increases the size of the select panel from 13 to 14 and in so doing, increases the number of minority appointments from 5 to 6, and also clarifies the reporting requirements.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Foxx amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A001) without objection.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Ms. Foxx.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Foxx amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Foxx amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
